description: Welcome to this beautifully maintained 3 bed  2.5-bath thome located in the highly sought-after Clayton neighborhood This bright & spacious home offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience for families and professionals alike. The main flr features an open-concept layout w/ laminate flooring, a modern kitchen equipped w/ s/s appliances, & a cozy dining & living area that’s perfect for entertaining or relaxing. Upstairs, you’ll find 2 generously sized bdrms including a well-appointed primary suite w/ an ensuite bath. The lower level includes a versatile third bedroom — ideal as a guest room, home office, or teenager’s space.Enjoy being close to schools, parks, & transit, & just a short walk to the future SkyTrain station along Fraser Hwy.
